import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { popupData } from 'src/app/interfaces/interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-common-popup', templateUrl: './common-popup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./common-popup.component.scss'] }) export class CommonPopupComponent { @Input() dataToShowinPopup : any ; submit:boolean = false; actionButtonClicked(){ this.submit = true; } cancelButtonClicked(){ this.submit = false; } } //You can have to pass the following data in following way to use this common component.. i.e, by taking this interface as reference //you can refer popupData interface in interfaces folder/ interfaces.ts file // data:popupData[]=[ // { // warningName : 'Remove User', // accountName : 'Anuja Kumari', // buttonName : 'Remove User', // detailsList : [ // {sno:1,content:'Access any Projects related to this Accound'}, // {sno:2,content:'Any Personal Data Synced with this Account'}] // } // ];
